title: Heartbreak, Secret Friends, and Stupid Doodles
description: Fandoms: MerlinRelationship: Merlin/Arthur Pendragon, Gwen/Lance--------------------------------------------------Modern uni AU: Merlin has a secret crush on Arthur, who has no idea who he is. When Arthur has a bad break up, Merlin takes it upon himself to cheer him up. Secretly, of course.
author: i_know_its_over
